criticalSuccess.message: Prepare Campsite: You find the perfect spot for a camp. Flat checks to determine encounters at the campsite for the next 24 hours have a DC 2 higher than normal, and the first 2 hours spent performing Camping activities does not incur the usual flat check for random encounters.

success.message: Prepare Campsite: You find a serviceable spot for a camp and for Camping activities.

failure.message: Prepare Campsite: Your campsite will work, but it’s not the best. Campsite activities that require checks take a –2 penalty.

criticalFailure.message: Prepare Campsite: Your campsite is a mess. You can use it to rest and to perform daily preparations, but it isn’t good enough to allow for Campsite activities at all. Worse, your attempt to secure a campsite has possibly attracted unwanted attention—attempt a flat check against the zone’s Encounter DC. If successful, a random encounter automatically occurs.
